remarks: Heine-Borel theorem for real numbers.  A subset of ` RR ` is compact iff it is closed and bounded.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
statement:
reheibor.2 $e |- M = ( ( abs o. - ) |` ( Y X. Y ) ) $.
reheibor.3 $e |- T = ( MetOpen ` M ) $.
reheibor.4 $e |- U = ( topGen ` ran (,) ) $.
reheibor $p |- ( Y C_ RR -> ( T e. Comp <-> ( Y e. ( Clsd ` U ) /\ M e. ( Bnd ` Y ) ) ) ) $.
